title: Four Studies of Black Healing: Ritual (Published 2021)
author: GIONCARLO VALENTINE; The New York Times
description: Seeking spiritual intimacy beyond the realm of organized religion.
cleaned_text: What struck me most was the sheer trust and intimacy between these two men. Seeing young Black men adopt spiritual practices that deviate from traditionally held beliefs was refreshing and inspiring. It made me want to reconsider my own spiritual thinking, beyond theism and deities, and toward a relationship with a mind/body practice that could rejuvenate my spirit.
